channel.title: [Help] x10 Hits + Random End
channel.description: Ok so i added the new hit makers, and i added the x10 hits, but lets say i hit '7' that would be '70' '8' would be '80' and so on but i want it like '86' '74' ect adding the random value on the end, although im not hitting that final value its just for display... the video explains more, please help :) [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yl6hwtE4dG4[/youtube]

item.title: [Help] x10 Hits + Random End
item.dc:creator: @Bellend Bellend
item.description:
@Bellend wrote:

Ok so i added the new hit makers, and i added the x10 hits, but lets say i hit ‘7’ that would be ‘70’ ‘8’ would be ‘80’ and so on
but i want it like ‘86’ ‘74’ ect adding the random value on the end, although im not hitting that final value its just for display…
the video explains more, please help
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yl6hwtE4dG4[/youtube]

Read full topic
